document_data.name: Orvex Ocrammas
document_data.text: Orvex Ocrammas at your service, scribe and translator. And presently unemployed, judging by how the Red Wizards have fled.
document_data.mainbody: Eventually, the [[yuan-ti]] of Omu attacked the Thayans' encampment, killing most of the expedition. Orvex survived, but an explosion left him buried under a fallen wall, whereupon he was subsequently abandoned. He soon began suffering from exhaustion and dehydration.
document_data.Personality: Orvex was pragmatic and mercenary in his choice of employers,
